safety_description: Reasonable safety profile with typical awareness recommended. Local emergency facilities available with occasional weather events possible. Coastal location with water-related considerations. Solo exploration typically fine, generally fine for independent women.
crime_rate: low - generally safe with occasional petty crime
infrastructure_description: Utilities mostly reliable supporting daily life, reliable connectivity for connectivity. Complete car dependency, limited paved roads. Moderate walkability, limited ATM coverage — personal vehicle essential.
visa_requirements: 90-day visa-free, retirement visa available with $2000/month income
